main.speaker: Receptionist
main.text: Ah, I see. We've been having shortages in that department for a while now. Mr. Jefferson's room is on the 2nd floor, its just to the right of the elevator exit. Room 231 to be exact.
Yeah, I heard about it in the first interview. Hopefully I will be joining the team and helping to relief this shortage.

main.speaker: Receptionist
main.text: Yes, I hope so too. Best of luck!
Thank you, I will be on my way then.
